channel.title: stack on Luma's Shoka
channel.description: Recent content in stack on Luma's Shoka

item.title: Evaluate Reverse Polish Notation
item.description: Maintain a stack of result of the arithemetic expression. Push numbers into the stack. If it is an operator, pop two numbers out of the stack and evaluate it with the operator, and push the result back to the stack.

item.title: Parentheses Balance
item.description: Given a sequence of parentheses, determine if the parentheses are balanced or not. For example, “(())(()())” is balanced but “(()()))(” is not balanced. Solution: Maintain a stack of left parentheses. If a right parentheses mismatches, the sequence is unbalanced.
